text: China's Xi proposes 4 priorities for Ukraine, while Russia escalates its offensive. It's crucial that we stand firm in our support for Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity. The U.S. Congress must act swiftly to pass the Ukraine aid bill - our allies and the people of Ukraine are counting on us. We can't let internal debates hinder our commitment to freedom and democracy. #StandWithUkraine ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦
